In this Seminary students will be thoroughly in
tructed IN the different branches Of good English
and Classical Education, viz Reading. Writing,
Arithmetic, English Grammar, Geography, Compo-
sitlon. Elocuton, Mathematics, and the Greek and

So per session, or so. including the Mathematics;

session. Tuition money to be paid in advance.
There will be two sessions in the year, with a
short vacation between each


Good boarding can be obtained in respectable
i,nes in the village, at the rate Of Forty Dollars
per session and few boardcrs can be acconlmo-
dated in the family Of the Principal.

the English branches, exclusive Of Mathematics,
So per session, or so. including the Mathematics;
for the Languages, including the English, S1O per
session. Tuition money to be paid in advance.
There will be two sessions in the year, with a
short vacation between each


Good boarding can be obtained in respectable
i,nes in the village, at the rate Of Forty Dollars
per session and few boardcrs can be acconlmo-
dated in the family Of the Principal.


JOHN EDDOWES. Sec'v.

tertown elegraph-Centreye Timcs=-and in the

bills forwarded to the Secretary.

KvIIE Commissioners under the Act of December

stock Of the Pennsylvania. Delaware and Maryland
Steam Navigation Company, hereby gre notice that
the first lnstalment ofFve Dollars per share in sad
Company is requested TO be paid by the stockhoId,

Baltimore, or at the Bank Of Delaware, Wilmington

Books will be opened for additional subscriptions

Just received and for sale By r. PORIER&


SON, No. 81, .Markct-.areet.

and giving concise history, of the most important
events in Europe, as well as detailed account Of
the sanguinary battles in which he was engaged nor
connected with, down to the time of his death, IN
lG21--in three closely printed vo vols. more
valuable record, has perhaps seldom been oneredto
the Public and the facts are rendered still moreln
teresting by the popular talent of the noble writer
